name: MPMsoft
tag_list: practice-management, medical-billing, medical-billing-software, medical-coding-software, emr, electronic-medical-records
overview:
MPMsoft is practice management and medical billing software used by healthcare practices nationwide to manage their insurance claims and all aspects of patient billing.

Made for Windows 2000, XP, Vista, Server2003 and 2008, MPMsoft’s appeal is an extremely simple user interface that seamlessly integrates front office appointment scheduling with back office functions such as electronic billing, claim management, patient accounting, statements, and comprehensive reporting for improved practice management. MPMâ€™s core billing technology is the engine that powers an increasing number of EMRs with the ability to process electronic claims.

HISTORY: As an offshoot of MD Medical Services, a 25 year old medical billing service based in the Napa Valley, owner Jim Muschetti launched MPMsoft in 2003 to meet the complex billing needs of medical practices and billing services nationwide. Today MPMsoft supports over 4200 users, across some 30+ medical specialties with practices in all fifty states. Supporting several dozen clearinghouses, MPMsoft transmits electronic claims to over 3000 insurance payers.
